Title: Establishes an EBT card replacement program
Summary: Directs the commissioner of the office of temporary and disability assistance to develop and implement a program to replace all EBT cards issued in the state which utilize magnetic strips with cards that utilize chip technology.
LawCode: Add ยง131-sss, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to establishing an EBT card replacement program
